## ExpressServerConfig type

Configuration for a LoopBack based Express server

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ExpressServerConfig = (HttpOptions | HttpsOptions) & {
    basePath?: string;
    settings?: Record<string, unknown>;
};
```
